member.name: M:NJACTenor.Featured.GetFeaturedGIFs(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get Featured Images.
member.param: Search Items Limit. (Default is 10). Do Not Use Higher Limit if you Don't Need to. It May Takes Slightly Longer Time to Get Results.
member.returns: An NJAC Class Which Contains the Searched Items and Informations.

member.name: M:NJACTenor.Featured.GetFeaturedStickers(System.Int32,NJACTenor.TenorClient.StickerFilter)
member.summary: Get Featured Stickers.
member.param: Search Items Limit. (Default is 10). Do Not Use Higher Limit if you Don't Need to. It May Takes Slightly Longer Time to Get Results.

Select Which Type of Stickers You Want to Search. 'Static' or 'Animated' or 'Both'
- Search Both Type of Stickers. (Animated and Static).
- Search Only Animated Stickers.
- Search Only Static Stickers.
member.returns: An NJAC Class Which Contains the Searched Items and Informations.

member.name: M:NJACTenor.Featured.GoNextPage(NJACTenor.NextPageToken)
member.summary: Go to the Next Page (If any)
member.param: Use Which Contains Values like Token and Query To Go to the Next Page.
member.returns: Return as . It Can be or Depend on Your Search Query.

member.name: M:NJACTenor.Search.SearchGIF(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Search GIF Images.
member.returns: Returns Which Contains Searched Images Items.

member.name: M:NJACTenor.Search.SearchSticker(System.String,System.Int32,NJACTenor.TenorClient.StickerFilter)
member.summary: Search Sticker.
member.param:
Select Which Type of Stickers You Want to Search. 'Static' or 'Animated' or 'Both'
- Search Both Type of Stickers. (Animated and Static).
- Search Only Animated Stickers.
- Search Only Static Stickers.
member.returns: An NJAC Class Which Contains the Searched Items and Informations.

member.param: Use Which Contains Values like Token and Query To Go to the Next Page.

member.name: M:NJACTenor.TenorClient.AutoCompleteSuggestions(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the AutoComplete Suggestion. (Helpful if you want to make your application's search system more easy)
member.param: A Short Text to Get the List of AutoComplete Search Items.
member.example: If you want to get the list of all search items starts with 'good' like 'good day' or 'good morning' then type 'good' in Term.
member.param: Search Items Limit. (Default is 10). Do not use Higher Limit if You Don't Need to.
member.returns: A which contains the AutoComplete Suggestions.
